content: written pattern http //www crochetwithclare com/jessica-shawl html video tutorial https //www youtube com/playlist list=plbal2euiyeksgdwpw7tj0gwdc2qpis9tt welcome to the crochet jessica shawl cal crochet-a-long the cal will be starting on friday 16th february at 12 midday australian sydney time aest and will be the release of the written pattern and the 1st of 3 parts of the tutorial for the main body of the shawl friday 2nd march at 12 midday australian sydney time aest will be the 2nd and 3rd part of the tutorial the 2nd video will teach you how to crochet the edging and the 3rd will teach you how to wash and block your shawl
